lead_paragraph: Right after getting off the plane, sweat beads will start to gather on your forehead. That's just Rio de Janeiro's ever-present humidity saying "hello."

headline.print_headline: Visitors to Rio Olympics Will Find All Senses Triggered
headline.main: Visitors to Rio Olympics Will Find All Senses Triggered

snippet: Right after getting off the plane, sweat beads will start to gather on your forehead. That's just Rio de Janeiro's ever-present humidity saying "hello."...
